title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.11 - Enforcement of laws, ordinances, rules and regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.11 - Enforcement of laws, ordinances, rules and regulations

State Regulations

All current ordinances of the cities or towns adjacent to
facilities of the authority or its subsidiaries or in which facilities of the
authority or any of its subsidiaries are located as well as all current local
laws, State, Federal laws and regulations and regulations of the authority
and/or its subsidiaries are to be applicable to authority facilities and are to
be enforced by all duly appointed police officers and security
officers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1155.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
